腇腇腇

腇字的基本解释

腇
něi
〔萎腇〕软弱，如“岂有知其无成，而但腇腇咋舌，叉手从族乎？”

腇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［něi］
［《集韻》弩罪切，上賄，泥。］
(1)见“腲腇”。
(2)见“萎腇”。

腇字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　腇； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页986第18
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?弩罪切，音娞。萎腇，耎弱貌。【後漢·馬援傳】萎腇咋舌叉手從族。【註】萎腇，耎弱也。　又【正韻】與餒同。亦作脮。

腇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
腇字的起名意思

暂无。

Foul
Basic explanation of words
Foul
něi
[Weakness] Weakness, such as "How can you know that there is nothing, but you are stunned, and you are from the clan?"
Foul
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [něi]
["Ji Yun" crossbow crime cut, bribery, mud. ]
(1) See "腲腇".
(2) See "withering".
Foul
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　腇; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: Page 986 18
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Crossbow crime cut, sound divine. Faint and weak in appearance. [Later Han·Ma Yuan Biography] Weary and choppy tongue and clan. [Note] Weak and weak.　[Zheng Yun] and Nei are the same. Also known as 脮.
